metadata.Plot: Dog trainer Alex is about to propose when his girlfriend gives him a list of changes that she would like him to do.
metadata.Writer: Harris Goldberg, Kristen D'Alessio, Becca Johanson
metadata.Actors: Patrick Fugit, Jennifer Morrison, Karen Gillan
